user_sentiment: uncertain - potentially receptive but pivoting to a new concern
execution_quality: Solid incremental progress with methodical exploration and implementation, though the plan was incomplete (cut off mid-sentence) and the agent had to infer remaining requirements. The work touched multiple systems but didn't deliver a complete, integrated solution.
